DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AGRICULTURE
DOC.TEXT: 2 # 000 Pounds of U.S. Apples Reach China : The consignment of Red_Delicious arrived by air this month and is the first U.S. fruit to officially be sold in China in commercial quantities , officials said . A second 18 # 000-pound consignment is_due to arrive Friday.The apples represent a victory for U.S. negotiators urging China , which has a $ 23-billion trade surplus with the United States , to open its markets . It took two years of discussions before Chinese quarantine officials would allow the apples to be imported , the growers said . Washington apple growers say they hope to sell 20 million pounds of the fruit to China in the next 12 months , and U.S. officials hope grapes , tobacco and other agricultural products will follow .
